name: Public Official
description:
Feel how pain in the ass it is to find a document in French administration.

This game was made with Unity during the "No Future Contest", 2013.

It's a basic metroid-vania game inspired by Kyle Pittman's "You have to win the game" game. Public Official is inspired of personnal confusion with French Administration (do you know the scene in The Twelve Tasks of Asterix where the team has to find the A38 pass ?). The more you progress in the game, the more it glitches. Also, you have time limitation. How many ? I don't know, i lost it in my documents.

In retrospect (2019), I can't play this game without focusing on errors or mistaskes I made in programmation or general design. So the game is "as it was" unpretencious, in 2013.

Controls :
- Arrows or Joystick to move
- Space or A Button on Xbox controller to jump
- Left Alt or X Button to shoot with the gun. You don't have it at the begining.
